p: In terms of the DoP “Bioactivity,” the second-largest proportion of papers was published in the African Journal of Traditional, Complementary and Alternative Medicines (6.5%, 12 articles), followed by Phytotherapy Research (3.5%, 6 articles, COPE member) and African Health Sciences (2.7%, 5 articles). Ninety-seven other journals with minor article distribution (<2.5%) were identified and summarized under “Other” (72.6%, 135 articles). The majority of these journals are not COPE members (64 journals).
